meanings.definition: A unit of length equal to 1/1000th of a fathom.
meanings.sent1: The fisherman measured the depth of the lake using a yelm.
meanings.sent2: The sailor estimated the distance to the shore in yelms.
meanings.sent3: The children used a yelm as a tiny bridge for their toy cars.
meanings.sent4: The thread was so thin, it seemed like a yelm in the fabric of the dress.
meanings.sent5: The tiny insect crawled a yelm's length in a minute.
